Package Assegnamento1.User

Class Person

java.lang.Object
Assegnamento1.User.Person
Direct Known Subclasses:
Client, Employee
public class Person extends Object
The class Person is used to represents user/employee/admin entity. It contains property and methods used to manage users and employees.
